<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title>Voice â†’ n8n (Iconâ€‘Only UI)</title>
<style>
  body{margin:0;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;background:transparent;}
  #btn{
    position:fixed;
    top:0px;left:0px;
    width:40px;height:40px;
    border:none;border-radius:8px;
    font-size:1.2rem;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:background .2s;
    background:#00000000; /* default grey */
    color:#777;
  }
  
  #btn:hover{
    background-color: #343a3f;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
  }
  
  #btn.listening{background:#4caf50}  /* greenâ€‘jade */
  #btn.finished{background:#0097a7}   /* blue/aqua */
  #btn.error{background:#e53935}      /* red */
</style>
</head>
<body>

<button id="btn" title="Click to speak" aria-label="Start speaking">ðŸŽ¤</button>
<script>
/*==============================================================*/
/* 1ï¸âƒ£  Speech recognizer â€“ Chrome/Safari
/*==============================================================*/
const SpeechRecognition =
    window.SpeechRecognition || window.webkitSpeechRecognition;

if (!SpeechRecognition) {
  document.getElementById('btn').title = 'Speech API not supported';
  document.getElementById('btn').disabled = true;
}

const rec = new SpeechRecognition();
rec.lang = 'en-US';
rec.interimResults = true;
rec.continuous = true;
rec.maxAlternatives = 1;

/*==============================================================*/
/* 2ï¸âƒ£  State
/*==============================================================*/
let fullTranscript = '';   // confirmed words
let currentInterim = '';   // latest interim words
let silenceTimer = null;   // 2â€‘s silence timer
let isListening = false;   // recognizer active

const btn = document.getElementById('btn');

/*==============================================================*/
/* 3ï¸âƒ£  Utility
/*==============================================================*/
function setButtonState(state, icon='ðŸŽ¤') {
  btn.className = '';                // clear all classes
  if (state) btn.classList.add(state);   // add the new state class
  btn.textContent = icon;
}

/*==============================================================*/
/* 4ï¸âƒ£  POST final text
/*==============================================================*/
async function sendToN8N(text) {
  const url = '/system/webdev/Iggy/speech/process';
  
  const queryString = window.location.search;
  const params = new URLSearchParams(queryString);
  const data = {};
  for (const [key, value] of params.entries()) {
    data[key] = value;
  }
  data['text'] = text
  
  try {
    const response = await fetch(url, {
      method: 'POST',
      headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
      body: JSON.stringify(data)
    });
    await response.json();          // ignore the payload
    setButtonState('finished', 'âœ…');
  } catch (err) {
    console.error('Error POSTing speech:', err);
    setButtonState('error', 'âŒ');
  }
}

/*==============================================================*/
/* 5ï¸âƒ£  Silence timer helper
/*==============================================================*/
function resetSilenceTimer() {
  clearTimeout(silenceTimer);
  silenceTimer = setTimeout(() => {
    silenceTimer = null;
    rec.stop();
    isListening = false;
    setButtonState('finished', 'âœ…');

    sendToN8N(fullTranscript.trim());
  }, 2000);  // 2â€¯s silence
}

/*==============================================================*/
/* 6ï¸âƒ£  Event handlers
/*==============================================================*/
rec.onresult = (event) => {
  resetSilenceTimer();          // any new data resets the timer
  currentInterim = '';          // start fresh for this batch

  for (let i = event.resultIndex; i < event.results.length; i++) {
    const res = event.results[i];
    const txt = res[0].transcript.trim();

    if (res.isFinal) {
      fullTranscript += txt + ' ';
      currentInterim = '';
    } else {
      currentInterim += txt + ' ';
    }
  }

  // Show the live line in the buttonâ€™s title (tooltip)
  btn.title = (fullTranscript + (currentInterim ? ' ' + currentInterim : '')).trim();
};

rec.onerror = (err) => {
  console.error('Speech error:', err);
  setButtonState('error', 'âŒ');
};

rec.onend = () => {
  // If the silence timer hasnâ€™t fired, weâ€™re still midâ€‘sentence.
  if (!silenceTimer) {
    // Nothing to do â€“ the recognizer can simply restart on next click.
  }
};

/*==============================================================*/
/* 7ï¸âƒ£  Click to start / retry
/*==============================================================*/
btn.onclick = () => {
  if (isListening) return;   // ignore doubleâ€‘clicks

  fullTranscript   = '';
  currentInterim   = '';
  isListening      = true;
  btn.title        = 'Listeningâ€¦';
  setButtonState('listening', 'ðŸ”Š');   // green while listening

  rec.start();
};
</script>
</body>
</html>
